channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 情報源: BBCは高給取り社員の自動昇給を止め、代わりに業績に応じて昇給させる計画（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Sources: the BBC plans to stop automatic annual pay increases for its highest-paid employees and instead hand them raises based on their performance  —  EXCLUSIVE: The BBC wants to overhaul how it awards salary rises to its highest-paid employees and presenters, Deadline understands.

item.title: NPRは4月12日から5日間、ウリ・ベルリナーを無給の停職処分にした。
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
NPR suspended Uri Berliner for five days without pay, starting on April 12, after he wrote an essay accusing NPR of losing the public's trust  —  NPR has formally punished Uri Berliner, the senior editor who publicly argued a week ago that the network had “lost America's trust” …

item.title: ニュージーランドのStuff GroupがWBDと契約、WBDのニュージーランドTVチャンネルに毎日午後6時のニュース番組を提供、WBDは7月5日にNewshubを閉鎖予定（Lucy Craymer/Reuters）
item.description:
Lucy Craymer / Reuters:
New Zealand's Stuff Group signs a deal with WBD to provide WBD's New Zealand TV channel with a 6PM daily news program; WBD plans to close Newshub on July 5  —  New Zealand media site Stuff Group said on Tuesday it had signed an agreement with Warner Bros Discovery (WBD.O) …

item.title: MozillaとCheckFirst：アップル、グーグル、メタなどの広告透明性への取り組みは、EUのDSAが検索可能なライブラリを義務付けてから数ヶ月経った現在も進行中だ（Natasha Lomas/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Natasha Lomas / TechCrunch:
Mozilla and CheckFirst: Apple, Google, Meta, and others' ad transparency efforts are a work in progress, months after the EU's DSA mandated a searchable library  —  Efforts by tech giants to be more transparent about the ads they run are — at very best — still a work in progress …

item.title: カナダでFacebookがニュースをブロックすると、意見や検証されていないコンテンツへのユーザーの関与が増え、政治的な言論が損なわれる可能性があるという2つの研究結果（Byron Kaye/Reuters）
item.description:
Byron Kaye / Reuters:
Two studies find Facebook blocking news in Canada could undermine political discourse by increasing user engagement with opinion and non-verified content  —  Since Meta blocked links to news in Canada last August to avoid paying fees to media companies, right-wing meme producer Jeff Ballingall …

item.title: イスラエル人作家ジョアンナ・チェンのエッセイをめぐってスタッフが反旗を翻し、ゲルニカのボランティアEICを辞任したジーナ・ムーアとのQ&A、ゲルニカの政治などについて（Ben Smith/Semafor）
item.description:
Ben Smith / Semafor:
Q&A with Jina Moore on resigning as volunteer EIC of Guernica after staff revolted over an essay by Israeli writer Joanna Chen, Guernica's politics, and more  —  Q&A  —  Ben: What is Guernica for?  Why did you become involved in it?  —  Jina: It caught me as a reader because it was different from other magazines.

item.title: 2018年から、ロンドンでインターン用の住居を手配し、既存のジャーナリストに空き部屋を提供してもらったPressPadが閉鎖される（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
PressPad, which arranged housing for interns in London by asking established journalists to offer up their spare rooms, starting in 2018, is shutting down  —  “While there is even more need for this intervention than when we began the project, the initiative needs more resources than the current team can provide.”

item.title: グーグルのジグソーが、有害コメントを特定するためのMLツール群「Perspective API」を拡張し、ニュアンスを含む7つの新しい属性に基づいて投稿のランク付けを支援する（Billy Perrigo/TIME）
item.description:
Billy Perrigo / TIME:
Google's Jigsaw expands Perspective API, its set of ML tools for identifying toxic comments, to help rank posts based on seven new attributes, including nuance  —  In the 1990s and early 2000s, technologists made the world a grand promise: new communications technologies would strengthen democracy …

item.title: 手紙Xの弁護士はブラジル最高裁判所に対し、ソーシャルメディア・プラットフォームは同裁判所またはブラジルの最高選挙裁判所が下したすべての判決に従うと述べた（Ricardo Brito/Reuters）
item.description:
Ricardo Brito / Reuters:
Letter: X's lawyers tell Brazil's Supreme Court that the social media platform will comply with every ruling issued by the court or Brazil's top electoral court  —  Lawyers representing Elon Musk's X told Brazil's Supreme Court that the social media platform will comply with every ruling issued …

item.title: ロシア司法省がBBCロシア特派員のイリヤ・バラバノフと科学記者のアーシャ・カザンツェワを「外国人工作員」と認定、両者は現在海外在住（Laurence Peter/BBC）
item.description:
Laurence Peter / BBC:
Russia's Ministry of Justice labels BBC Russian correspondent Ilya Barabanov and science reporter Asya Kazantseva as “foreign agents”; both now live abroad  —  The Russian justice ministry has labelled two prominent journalists - BBC Russian correspondent Ilya Barabanov …

item.title: 南アフリカの大手メディア「ザ・デイリー・マーベリック」が、広告収入、助成金、フィランソロピー支援が「枯渇」していることを読者に知らせるため、サイトを1日閉鎖（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Major South African outlet The Daily Maverick takes down its site for a day to alert readers to ad revenue, grant funding, and philanthropic support “drying up”  —  A major South African news website has taken “drastic” action to raise awareness of the “crisis in journalism” by shutting down for 24 hours.

item.title: 2021年の撮影監督ハリーナ・ハッチンズの射殺事件で、18カ月の実刑判決を受けたラスト・ムービーの兵器係ハンナ・グティエレス（Winston Cho/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Winston Cho / Hollywood Reporter:
Rust movie armorer Hannah Gutierrez is sentenced to 18 months in prison in the 2021 accidental shooting death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins  —  Hannah Gutierrez-Reed was convicted last month for her role in the accidental shooting death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins.

item.title: スラックメッセージ：NYTによるガザ戦報道に関する機密情報漏洩の有無に関する調査は、決定的な結果を得ることなく終了した（Alexandra Bruell/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Alexandra Bruell / Wall Street Journal:
Slack message: NYT's probe into whether staff leaked confidential information about its Gaza war coverage ended without any conclusive findings  —  Times Executive Editor Joe Kahn said there were ‘gaps in the way proprietary journalistic material is handled’

item.title: 情報筋インスタグラムは、トップ・インフルエンサー向けに、クリエイターの「声」でファンへのDM返信を自動化する「クリエイターAI」チャットボットをテストする初期段階にある（New York Times）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: Instagram is in the early stages of testing “Creator AI” chatbots for top influencers, which would automate DM responses to fans in a creator's “voice”  —  Instagram is testing a program that offers its top influencers the ability to interact with their followers over direct messages using a chatbot.

item.title: CNNが、クリス・リヒトがゲイル・キングとチャールズ・バークレーをホストに2023年秋にスタートさせたゴールデンタイムの週1回1時間番組「キング・チャールズ」を低視聴率のため打ち切り（Ariel Zilber/New York Post）
item.description:
Ariel Zilber / New York Post:
CNN axes King Charles, its weekly one-hour primetime show launched in fall 2023 by Chris Licht with hosts Gayle King and Charles Barkley, due to low ratings  —  The CNN weekly prime time talk show co-hosted by basketball loudmouth Charles Barkley and CBS morning star Gayle King has ended a six-month run that failed to produce ratings.
